titleStmt.title: The knight of the swanne Here beginneth the history of the noble Helyas knyght of the Swanne, newly translated out of Frensshe in to Englysshe at thinstygacion of the puyssaunt [and] illustryous Prynce Lorde Edwarde Duke of Buckyngham.
Chevalier au cygne. English.
titleStmt.author: Copeland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Robert Copland, of: Chevalier au Cygne.
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Last line of chapter 35 (leaf P1r?) begins: "seyll good"--STC.
Running title reads: Thistory of Helyas Knight of the Swanne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
